statements: UPDATE car_maintenance_history SET maintenance_type = 'Oil Change', cost = 50.00 WHERE car_id = 100
UPDATE car_maintenance_history SET maintenance_date = '2022-05-15', maintenance_description = 'Replaced Brake Pads' WHERE car_id = 101
UPDATE car_maintenance_history SET cost = 1500.00, maintenance_description = 'Replaced engine parts' WHERE car_id = 123 AND maintenance_date = '2021-09-15';
UPDATE car_maintenance_history SET maintenance_type = 'Oil Change', cost = 100.75 WHERE car_id = 456;
UPDATE car_data SET car_model = 'Toyota Corolla', mileage = 50000 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE car_data SET engine_temperature = 90.5, mileage = mileage + 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE maintenance_logs SET maintenance_cost = 250.75, maintenance_description = 'Oil Change', maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' WHERE car_id = 3;
